SRecProtocol.Server

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SRecServer

    public interface Server
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Zamora Batista. Interface Server, Contains all codes that are sent from server to clients.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte BAD
      CODE: BAD, when server indicate that operation was not successful.
      static byte OKK
      CODE: OKK, when server indicate that operation was successful.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getConnectionDetails()
      Get Connections Details.
      void startService()
      Start running the service.
      void stopService()
      Stop the service.
